meanings.definition: To officially order or decide something
meanings.sent1: The king will decreer a new law for the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The judge will decreer the final verdict in the court case.
meanings.sent3: The mayor decreed a holiday for all the townspeople to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: The principal decreed that all students must wear uniforms.
meanings.sent5: The president decreed a national day of celebration for unity.

meanings.definition: To proclaim or announce something officially
meanings.sent1: The queen decreed a royal decree for all to hear.
meanings.sent2: The town crier decreed the news in the village square.
meanings.sent3: The magician decreed the start of his amazing show with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: The captain decreed the ship's arrival with a blast of the horn.
meanings.sent5: The teacher decreed the winner of the spelling bee with pride.
